Print, "Side View of the First Carriage (1686) of Lord Castelmaine Built in 1686 by Andrea Cornely after Ciro Ferri, 1687-1700", 1687–1700.
1687–1700. Etching and engraving on off-white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane. 1945-17-4-a.
